name: Syrinscape Soundset Creator
notes: The installer needs to be downloaded manually.

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files/Syrinscape SoundSet Creator/Syrinscape SoundSet Creator.exe

content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Select the Installer File
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Syrinscape SoundSet Creator/Syrinscape SoundSet Creator.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Installing Syrinscape Soundset Creator
    executable: $installer
    name: wine.wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
